data.name: Project F4E
data.detailed_description:
Join our Discord!


Join us on Discord, and you might get immediate access!


About the Game

ğŸŒJoin the F4E PROLOGUE

- A massive and wonderful pre-launch campaign that includes a lot of ğŸš€Pre-Launch Seasons.
- In each Season you can earn â­Prologue Points by completing the specific ğŸ“œPrologue Quests that each season will have.
- If you earn enough â­Prologue Points youâ€™ll be rewarded with ğŸExclusive Gifts that cannot be earned after launch, you can even earn the game (yep!).
- Check it out here: https://betadwarf.com/f4e/

ğŸ”°PvE MOBA/MMO/ROGUE hybrid - a new PvE genre
- As a MOBA player you'll instantly know how to control and enjoy the intense mission session gameplay and the freshness of no lanes.
- As an MMO player, you'll enjoy the focus on tense co-op missions and on hangout socialization and customization between intense missions.
- As a ROGUE player, you'll enjoy the deep character progression sessions and the difficulty.

ğŸ—¿Living Missions
You're entering generated Missions with maps that must be explored in a an alive environment, as both NPC allies and enemies walk around with their own agendas, it's not a linear dungeon it's a living level with 360 degrees of freedom.

ğŸ‘¬True co-op
Co-op is at the front seat both in the tactical combat and in the constant strategic decisions that must be taken. Maybe two of you decide to support an allied ğŸ—¿Golem autonomously walking towards an enemy general. Meanwhile the 3rd player further away, tries to explore for ğŸ’Shards you can use to upgrade the ğŸ—¿Golem just before impact.
Simultaneously you made the decision not to defend one of the ğŸ—¼Structures you build, which is now assaulted by enemies, a hard but interesting choice similar to the ones you take in a traditional Mobas but in a completely new structure without lanes.

ğŸ§™ğŸ½â€â™‚ï¸Thousands of character builds
Project F4E features multiple classes and hundreds of Powers that can be combined in thousands of builds, all for you to experiment with in each procedurally generated mission!

ğŸ’ªğŸ½Infinite character growth
Built to last forever, F4E offers thousands of hours of playtime; as you build new heroes in each mission, you also gain new powers and gear to make you permanently stronger!


Project F4E is a working title, but we didnâ€™t want to hold back on telling everyone about it :)

data.short_description: F4E is a unique blend of MMO, ARPG, MOBA and Rogue-lite! Come see for your self and participate the ğŸŒPrologue Pre-Launch Seasons to earn ğŸExclusive Rewards that are not earnable after launch.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 4 cores @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050-Ti or Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: TBD
  • Processor: TBD
  • Graphics: TBD
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: TBD MB available space
